title: The Number One Swordsman Is Very Lonely - Novel Updates
tags: Cold Love Interests   Cute Story   Famous Protagonist   Low-key Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Multiple Protagonists   Popular Love Interests   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Seme Protagonist   Short Story   Strong Love Interests
author: 一炷香
description:
The Number One Swordsman was very lonely, he wanted to fight.

The Number Two Swordsman always followed behind, not letting him fight.

Later, they met the Number Three Swordsman, and gossip spread all over the world—the Number One Swordsman and the Number Two Swordsman were together.

However, everyone had their own thoughts:

The Number Two Swordsman: I’m a third wheel

The Number Three Swordsman: I’m a third wheel

The Number One Swordsman: The Number Two Swordsman feels good to touch.>
